channel.title: No-IP
channel.description:
...Anger gets to best of us sometimes
This is my FIRST ... EVER... thread asking for help.. I usually try for months until I get something to work
Well, I've been trying to get No-IP going since the day I started, three months ago.
It's just the usual error connecting to server..
I have a No-IP I have the network I have DUC v2.2.1 I have my server running I have my client running - Same name, could this be effecting it? I have port forwarded I have my router set up
I persist to have use Hamachi due to the fact No-IP never works. Any help?

I’d seriously think theres an answer to this. I’ve done EVERYTHING

item.title: No-IP
item.dc:creator: @pwnu111 pwnu111
item.description:
@pwnu111 wrote:

ok heres an idea i hope it works ok runserver.bat then go to no-ip.com and sign in
then go to left and click add

now name of server and pick .no-ip.biz or .servegame

or any of those. then dont change anything else scroll to bottom and click finish or sumtin like it

hope it works cus ur a good siggy maker and stuff like that so i want u to make more siggys and banners for people

~coleby~

Read full topic
